concept.title: Using Import, Export, and Download Features

conbody.p: This chapter describes how to use SenSage AP Analyzer to import and export its data objects such as reports, charts, and dashboards.
This chapter contains the following topics:

p.note: IMPORTANT: There is no way to import/export both reports and dashboards at the same time in one file. You can manually do this by editing an XML file. When you export the dashboard any underlying reports are also exported.
